title: Digital Badge Design and Implementation Process for Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical-statistical processing skills and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Information evaluation/analysis training program to strengthen job competencies in mathematics. Learning motivation and achievement visualization via a digital badge system.

learning_goals: Cultivating critical thinking skills to evaluate the credibility of mathematical information in academic/practical materials
Acquiring the ability to design a system that certifies the information identification-selection-utilization process in stages through digital badges
Developing the ability to perform projects that make decisions based on information literacy in the mathematical problem-solving process
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
